SELECT mtNo, mtVolume, mg_no, mg_name, mtRegdate, id, mileage FROM (SELECT row_number() over(ORDER BY mt_no DESC) AS rnum, t.mt_no AS mtNo, t.mt_volume AS mtVolume, to_char(t.mt_regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS mtRegdate, t.mg_no, mg.mg_name, u.id, u.mileage FROM MILEAGE_TRADE t INNER JOIN MILEAGE_GROUP mg ON mg.mg_no=t.mg_no INNER JOIN users u ON t.id = u.id AND u.id=#{id}) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNumber} AND #{endRowNumber} ORDER BY mtNo DESC
